meta.title: Go be smart - Sustainable heating simplified
meta.description: Dashboard for installers to monitor and control heat pumps remotely. Making commissioning, servicing, and customer support faster and simpler.

hero.title: Sustainable heating
hero.description: Allowing your installer to monitor, diagnose, and optimise your heat pump remotely.

about.title: About us
about.description: Heat pumps are being installed without proper commissioning or monitoring. The result? Inefficiencies, wasted energy, and avoidable service visits. To unlock the full potential of heat pumps, we’re building a modern solution which enables:

features.efficiency: Improved heat pump efficiency and lifespan

descriptions.keje: Our data & ML expert. He prefers to spend his time building IoT solutions. You can wake up Keje in the middle of the night to talk about heat pumps.
descriptions.charlie: Versed in marketing and sales, this innovation expert now wants to build real solutions contributing to a more sustainable energy system.
descriptions.age: Solving abstract problems is what makes Age tick. After his PhD in theoretical biophysics, he has now immersed himself in the world of modern software.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Want to know more? We'd love to hear from you.

form.success: Thank you! We'll be in touch soon.
